positions.description:
Oversight & Control - Controls Room Support Services

Department Description: 
The Oversight and Control Group's mission is to solidify an effective Firmwide control framework within and across the lines of business by identifying and remediating control issues. The Controls Room functions as a utility for the firm, providing control and compliance reporting, metrics and data analytics at the Enterprise level. The Controls Room Operate Team functions as the support/help desk for the department.

Responsibilities:
- Provide daily system support operations including issue resolution, user requests, enhancement requests, user acceptance testing, etc.
- Provide technology troubleshooting support for basic user issues or system issues.
- Coordinate access administration and support re-certification for the Controls Room application.
positions.title: Business Operate Support Analyst

positions.description:
Led an artillery platoon comprised of 25 members and outfitted with $1.5 million in equipment. Maintained group morale during deployment, ensuring that all personnel redeployed safely without incident. Supervised the reintegration process of personnel back from Afghanistan without any incidents.  
â¢	Planned, coordinated, and executed over 40 fire missions with a 100% success rate.
â¢	Served as the battery unit movement officer.  Coordinated the successful deployment of 9 shipping containers worth $20 million out of Afghanistan.
â¢	Served as the battery training officer.  Planned, coordinated, and conducted training for over 50 personnel within the organization.
positions.title: Platoon Leader/ Fire Direction Officer

positions.description:
Led an artillery section comprised of 6 members and outfitted with $1 million in equipment. Planned, coordinated, and conducted a comprehensive training program to prepare the section for deployment. Developed and mentored section members to forge a cohesive team. Planned and coordinated a multitude of combat and humanitarian operations while deployed in support of Operation Enduring Freedom.
â¢	Organized training for our brigade combat observation lasering teams, which resulted in 100% qualification rate.
â¢	Served as operations coordinator during first 3 months of deployment; responsible for planning over 30 combat patrols.
â¢	Developed radio broadcasts for the local population, which led to an increased confidence in the local government and enhanced stability within a district of over 60,000 people.  
â¢	Completed Field Artillery Officer Basic Course from September 2010 to March 2011.
â¢	Served as a cadre member at the Leadership Training Course at Fort Knox, KY, from June 2010 to September 2010.
positions.title: Fire Support Officer
